name: Hemlane
description: All-in-one property management with AI-powered leasing, rent collection, and maintenance coordination for busy landlords.
target_audience_match: Ideal for hands-on landlords juggling everything themselves and craving smarter workflows without a property manager.

name: Rentec Direct
description: Affordable software that helps small landlords automate payments, screen tenants, and stay organized without the fuss.
target_audience_match: Great for budget-conscious landlords who want modern tools that just work.

name: Avail by Realtor.com
description: Free landlord toolkit for managing listings, screening tenants, collecting rent, and handling maintenance in one place.
target_audience_match: Perfect for new or part-time landlords who want real tools without spending a dime.

name: TurboTenant
description: Manage rentals with a free core platform and optional upgradesâ€”ideal for flexible, no-subscription landlords.
target_audience_match: Made for solo landlords who want everything in one dashboard without committing to a monthly plan.

name: Innago
description: 100% free property management software that automates leases, payments, and tenant communications effortlessly.
target_audience_match: Best for DIY landlords who want premium automation tools with zero monthly cost.
